instruction: Evaluate the effectiveness of the advertising copy below.
input: Say goodbye to your daily worries and hello to your new life of freedom and relaxation.
output: The advertising copy is effective as it is appealing and creates a sense of aspiration. It taps into the target audience's desires of wanting to reduce worries and having more freedom and relaxation. The use of "say goodbye" and "hello" is powerful and creates a sense of urgency to act now and seize the desired lifestyle.
